org.apache.hadoop.fs

Class QuotaUsage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.QuotaUsage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentSummary

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class QuotaUsage
extends Object
    Store the quota usage of a directory.
